articles.title: Central Court Gives American to 8 Years Hard Labor
articles.content:
Central Court Gives American to 8 Years Hard Labor
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A trial of Aijalon Mahli Gomes, male U.S. citizen, was held at a court of justice of the Central Court of the DPRK on Tuesday.
					 An examination was made of the hostile act committed against the Korean nation and the trespassing on the border of the DPRK against which an indictment was brought in and his guilt was confirmed according to the relevant articles of the criminal code of the DPRK at the trial. On this basis, the court sentenced him to eight years of hard labor and a fine of 70 million won.
					
					 The accused admitted all the facts which had been put under accusation.
					
					 The presence of representatives of the Swedish embassy here to witness the trial was allowed as an exception at the request of the Swedish side protecting the U.S. interests.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Back Home
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Back Home
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, came back home by a special plane on Wednesday after wrapping up his official goodwill visit to Gabon, Gambia and Senegal.
					 He was accompanied by Choe Chang Sik, minister of Public Health, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other suite members.
					
					 They were greeted at the airport by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the SPA Presidium, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Pong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health, and Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest Opens
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize sports contest was opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street Wednesday in the run up to the Day of the Sun.
					 Its participants will compete in nearly 40 events including football, basketball, volleyball, weightlifting, wrestling, judo, field hockey, field and track and gymnastics to be held in Pyongyang, Chongjin, Wonsan, Sariwon and other places.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned and sportspersons.
					
					 Pak Hak Son, chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, made an address there.

articles.title: World Health Day Event Held
articles.content:
World Health Day Event Held
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- An event took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday on World Health Day.
					 Attending the event were officials of ministries and national institutions, public and health organizations.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the missions of international organizations including the mission of the WHO in the DPRK, the Swedish ambassador to the DPRK and staff members of embassies of foreign countries here. 
					
					 Ri Pong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health, addressing the meeting, said that the DPRK has taken state measures to improve the ecological environment of all areas including cities and rural areas.
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK would as ever continue paying deep attention to the urbanization and the health of people in close touch with international organizations.
					
					 Sarveshwar Puri, representative of the WHO, made a speech there.
					
					 A CD related to the issue of urbanization and health of people was shown and a group performance of the Taekwon-Do exercise for health by public health workers took place at the event.
					
					 A similar event took place in Phyongsong City in South Phyongan Province on the day.
					
					 Speeches were made by Choe Kwang Ho, vice-chairman of the Phyongsong City People's Committee, and Sarveshwar Puri.
					
					 The attendants planted trees of good species before appreciating a performance given by a hygienic propaganda team of schoolchildren.
					
					 The day was also observed in various parts of the country.

articles.title: Film "Great Devotion" Screened
articles.content:
Film "Great Devotion" Screened
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Documentary film "Great Devotion (Year of Great Changes, 2009)" was screened at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of the election of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 The documentary deals with the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed by glorifying last year as a year of dramatic changes to be specially recorded in the history of the country, the year which witnessed the advent of a brilliant era when all the ideals of the people are being translated into realities, after unrolling a grand blueprint for opening the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The film also deals with historical facts that after kindling the torch of a new revolutionary surge in Kangson, the birthplace of the Chollima movement, Kim Jong Il dynamically encouraged the whole party and army and all the people to victoriously conclude the historic 150-day campaign and the 100-day campaign by giving tireless field guidance to hundreds of units across the country. 
					
					 It was appreciated by senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A new stamp (sheetlet) was issued in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea for an international exposition of philately which will be held in a city in the northern area of Belgium from April 9.
					 Printed in the upper part of the stamp are an inscription "In Commemoration of the Antwerp 2010 International Exposition of Philately" and pictures of such rare animals as Brachyramphus perdix, Gallinago solitaria, Porzana paykullii, Pernis apivorus, Pongo pygmaeus and Loxodonta africana.
					
					 Other stamps showing such orchidaceous plants as Dendrobium-Hybriden, Cymbidium Lillian Stewart "Red Carpet", Epidendrum radiatum and Sophronitella brevipendunculata were also issued.

articles.title: Organic Fermentation Accelerant Developed
articles.content:
Organic Fermentation Accelerant Developed
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Aeguk Research Centre for Compound Microorganisms of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has developed an organic fermentation accelerant "Compound No. 1".
					 It includes over 20 kinds of microorganisms promoting disintegration and fermentation processes of vegetable or animal organic matters. 
					
					 It raises the rate of disintegration and fermentation of organic matters 2-3 times compared with natural condition and much improves natural ecological environment of soil as it increases the number of useful microorganisms, including azotobacter, 10-100 times.
					
					 It also helps promote the development of crops roots, prevent damage by blights and boost harvest. 
					
					 The accelerant has already proved successful in organic fermentation, moss removal, prevention of root rot and damage by herbicide and diarrhoea and indigestion treatment of domestic animals.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts US Cry for "Tightened Alliance" with S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts US Cry for "Tightened Alliance" with S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The commander of the U.S. forces in the Pacific at a recent hearing at the Armed Services Committee of the House of Representatives underscored the "necessity" to "tighten alliance" between the U.S. and south Korea to "cope with provocation" by someone.
					 This is a clear indication of the U.S. ambition for aggression to launch a new war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost by instigating the south Korean puppet forces to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is the invariable strategic scenario of the U.S. to keep south Korea under its tighter military control and use it as a springboard from which to launch the second Korean war and, furthermore, establish military domination over Asia.
					
					 To this end, the U.S. is busy training the south Korean forces to fully serve its operational purpose in a bid to use it as a shock brigade in provoking the new war.
					
					 The "tightened alliance" between the U.S. and south Korea is prompted by this purpose. It is aimed to enhance the "role" of the puppet army in provoking and waging a war of aggression against the DPRK under the pretence of coordinating the military actions between the U.S. and south Korean forces.
					
					 The "tightened alliance" with south Korea much touted by the U.S. is a cynical ploy to cover up the U.S. attempt to keep its forces in south Korea for an indefinite period and the true nature of its policy for aggression against the DPRK and mislead the world public opinion.
					
					 For the past several decades the U.S. has brought to south Korea huge aggression troops and all types of war means while crying out for "tightened alliance" with south Korea. It has thus turned south Korea into its nuclear arsenal and an outpost for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 Last year the U.S. stipulated the provision of "extended deterrence" including "nuclear umbrella" to south Korea in the joint document of the U.S.-south Korea "summit" and deployed different types of operational hardware including 40 F-15Ks and smart bombs there.
					
					 Recently Aegis warships of the U.S. Navy entered Tonghae Port in south Kangwon Province and staged full-scale military exercises in the waters of the West Sea. The U.S. is also contemplating additionally deploying 21 F-15Ks as well as 125 new type medium-range air-to-air missiles, 35 air-to-ground missiles, 280 JDAMs and other war hardware in the near future. All these moves are part of its scenario to "tighten alliance" with south Korea.
					
					 The ceaseless war exercises are a product of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet army's policy of aggression and their theory of a war against the DPRK to all intents and purposes. They are, at the same time, an undisguised military confrontational racket intended to "tighten alliance" between them.
					
					 This alliance is, in a nutshell, nothing but an alliance for aggression and war targeted against the DPRK. It has only resulted in straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula and increasing the danger of a war on it.
					
					 The above-said moves to "tighten alliance" assume more grave nature as they are stepped up at a time when operational plans are being worked out in the U.S. and south Korea to cope with "contingency" in the DPRK and a black propaganda campaign has gained in scope and strength to tarnish the image of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. loud-mouthed "tightened alliance" is, in essence, nothing but its scenario to use war maniacs of south Korea in executing its anti-DPRK confrontational policy, launch a new war on the Korean Peninsula and violate the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The campaign of the U.S. and south Korea to "tighten their alliance" amounts to a hideous crime as it goes against the desire of the Koreans and other people of the world for peace on the Korean Peninsula and the need of the times.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to face up to the reality with a cool head and drop its wild ambition to put the DPRK and the rest of Asia under its domination by retaining its grip on south Korea.

articles.title: US and S. Korea Outbursts Flayed
articles.content:
US and S. Korea Outbursts Flayed
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Commander of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea Sharp let loose a spate of sophism about any "possible occurrence of contingency in the north" and the like at the U.S. House of Representatives and blustered that the forces together with south Korea were "making preparations to cope with every possible event." 
					 Timed to coincide with this, the "Advisory Council for Democracy and Peaceful Unification" of south Korea, etc. is more noisily talking about any "change" and crying out for military moves to cope with it. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard: 
					
					 The above-said outbursts let loose by the U.S. and the south Korean conservative group are a serious provocation disclosing their undisguised attempt to invade the DPRK and a despicable plot to hurt its international authority.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the south Korean authorities are getting more frantic in their moves to escalate the ill-famed confrontation of systems and provoke a war against the DPRK, pursuant to the policy of their American master. 
					
					 After working out such extremely provocative scenarios for invading the DPRK as "emergency ruling plan" and "study of a long-term program for unification" simulating a "contingency" the conservative group is going mad with the moves to launch aggression against it together with the U.S.
					
					 However, the "contingency" of which the U.S. and the south Korean conservative group are dreaming is nothing but an absurd delusion and a pipedream. 
					
					 The DPRK is an invincible state as it has its roots struck among the popular masses and is protected by the powerful army of Songun.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group would be well advised to care about their destiny before trumpeting about somebody's "contingency".
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean bellicose forces had better stop miscalculating.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon those who dare provoke it but mercilessly punish them as it regards its dignity and system as its life and soul.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Repent of Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Repent of Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have persisted in denying their past crimes and dodged their settlement.
					 Lurking behind their attitude is a black-hearted attempt to revive the past colonial rule, nostalgic about its days.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Recently a German court passed a life sentence on a former Nazi war criminal who killed civilians of Netherlands during the Second World War. However, the attitude of Japan, a war criminal state, stands out in sharp contrast to what Germany did.
					
					 More than half a century has passed since the end of the war but Japan has not even admitted the past aggression committed by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 It is the calculation of the Japanese reactionaries that with the flow of time Japan's past crimes would be obscure in people's memory and no longer be a matter of argument in the end. Hence, they are running the whole gamut of sophism intended to go without the liquidation of its past crimes at any cost.
					
					 The monstrous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists can neither be played down nor written off no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and no matter how frequently a generation is replaced by another. Japan's attempt to cover up its crimes would only render them graver and invite severer punishment.
					
					 Japan would be well advised to honestly reflect on its past crimes and settle them.

articles.title: WPK's Feats Praised
articles.content:
WPK's Feats Praised
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea is demonstrating its dignity as a revolutionary party which eternally glorifies the independent dignity of the people under the steersmanship of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il conducted energetic ideological and theoretical activities and elucidated for the first time the idea and theory that the socialist ruling party is, in essence, the servant of the people among other things and all the activities of the working-class party should be thoroughly based on the love and trust in the people. It became the guidelines that give a powerful impetus to the cause of building the revolutionary party.
					
					 Under his steersmanship the WPK has steadfastly maintained the independent stand in the revolutionary struggle and construction regarding it as a basic mission to defend the interests of the popular masses.
					
					 The people of the DPRK are exercising their rights as masters of all social activities including state control under the leadership of the WPK which shapes the line and policies fully reflecting the wishes and will of the masses and paves the way for the national prosperity relying on their revolutionary zeal and creative ingenuity.
					
					 Today the people of the DPRK are demonstrating their dignity as the people of a great power enjoying the single-minded unity and invincible national capability for self-defense which no other country can match.
					
					 The WPK is adding luster to the independent dignity of the people in the world after turning the DPRK into a great power with dignity under the uplifted banner of Songun. This is the greatest feat performed by it for the times and history.
					
					 Under his leadership, the WPK is enjoying high praises as a genuine mother party that successfully translates the ideal of the people into reality.
					
					 It is the steadfast will of Kim Jong Il that even a star should be picked up if it is desired by the people and no calculation should be prioritized to do so.
					
					 No force on the earth can destroy the might of the harmonious whole in which the party boundlessly loves the people and devotedly serves them and the people wholeheartedly follow the party regarding it as an embrace of their eternal life.

articles.title: World Health Day Observed
articles.content:
World Health Day Observed
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday dedicates a signed article to the 60th anniversary of the institution of World Health Day.
					 Saying that the WHO has organized various activities and events on the occasion of the day every year, the daily notes that the theme of the day for this year is "1,000 cities, 1,000 lives: issue of city and health".
					
					 The WHO put forward such special theme as the issue of city and health on World Health Day this year and has carried out the work on a full scale in order to address the issues of health of urbanites and quality of their living conditions, the article says.
					
					 Noting that colorful projects and activities have taken place in different parts of the DPRK according to the theme for this year, the article stresses that the DPRK will creditably play its role as a member state of the WHO and strengthen cooperation with the organization.

articles.title: British Association Blasts Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
articles.content:
British Association Blasts Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Mar. 27 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK campaign kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group. 
					 Bitterly denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group for their sinister scheme to bring down the socialist system of the DPRK by force of arms, the statement continued:
					
					 The stand clarified by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army on Mar. 25 is a very just and revolutionary stand to defend the sovereignty of the DPRK and most advantageous Korean-style socialism. 
					
					 It is quite just for the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrent to cope with all the moves of enemies including the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 "Contingency" in the DPRK touted by them is so unimaginable that nobody lends an ear to such sheer nonsense. 
					
					 The DPRK is the most stable and harmonious country in the world as it is guided by the Juche idea, the Songun idea.
					
					 The "contingency" touted by them will break out in south Korea where all sorts of social evils and ills, internal contradictions and "conflicts among the people" have reached an extreme phase. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group are working hard to bring down the socialist system in the DPRK.
					
					 It is a perfidy to socialism and the cause of independence to follow the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group even in a passive manner. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain made public a statement on the same day denouncing the germ warfare waged by the U.S. imperialists in the last Korean war.

articles.title: Finnish Figure Supports Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Finnish Figure Supports Korea's Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, released a statement on April 1 in support of the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation.
					 Noting that April 6 is a significant day marking the 17th anniversary of the publication of the work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" by Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the Korean people, the statement went on:
					
					 The 10-point programme initiated by Kim Il Sung serves as a great political programme as it brings the true meaning of patriotism home to the Korean people and clearly indicates the orientation and ways of achieving national reunification by the concerted efforts of the whole nation.
					
					The idea and line of great national unity set forth by the President out of his love for the nation and people have been successfully developed and enriched by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided the historic June 15 north-south joint declaration and opened a turning phase of independent reunification and great national unity. This was an event to be specially recorded in the Korean people's history of reunification movement.
					
					 The Finland-Korea Society regards the 10-point programme as a genuine patriotic programme and banner to be always held fast to in the struggle for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people would consolidate the national unity in the idea of "By our nation itself", the basic spirit of the joint declaration, and surely emerge victorious in their struggle to achieve the historical cause of independent reunification, peace and prosperity under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We will extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause, he added.

articles.title: Indian Figure Lauds Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Indian Figure Lauds Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- G. Debarajan, secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc, made public a statement on Apr. 1 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 He said in the statement that President Kim Il Sung, founder of the Workers' Party of Korea, was a great strategist and an ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander who defeated two imperialisms in one generation.
					
					 Kim Il Sung declared a war against the Japanese imperialists and applied superb guerilla war tactics with the extraordinary military wisdom and stratagem even though there was neither state rear nor support from regular army, thus striking one million-strong army of the Japanese imperialists with terror, he noted, and went on:
					
					The war, which the U.S. imperialists provoked against the young DPRK in 1950, was the fiercest one after World War .
					
					 Kim Il Sung defeated the U.S. imperialism which was boasting of being the "strongest" in the world with the original military tactics and bold and adroit operations.
					
					 In the post-war period, too, he declared that the DPRK would react to "retaliation" of the U.S. imperialists with retaliation and their all-out war with an all-out war and smashed all the moves of the enemies for aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 He is, indeed, a legendary hero and a military genius who performed military feats to be specially recorded in the world history by liberating Korea and creating the outstanding military ideas, original strategy and tactics and all-round experience through the protracted and arduous struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: RPDC somete al juicio al ciudadano estadounidense
articles.content:
RPDC somete al juicio al ciudadano estadounidense
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en el Tribunal Central de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el juicio sobre el ciudadano estadounidense, Aijalon Mahli Gomes.
					En la ocasion se realizo la investigacion sobre las acciones hostiles a la nacion coreana y el crimen de penetracion ilegal por la frontera y fue definida la culpabilidad basada en los articulos correspondientes de codigo penal de la RPDC, con lo cual el acusado fue condenado a los 8 anos de la pena de trabajo reformatorio y a la pena monetaria de 70 millones de wones (moneda nacional).
					
					El acusado norteamericano reconocio totalmente los hechos acusados.
					
					Segun la peticion de la parte sueca que protege los intereses de EE.UU., se permitio especialmente la observacion del juicio de representantes de la embajada de Suecia acreditada en la RPDC.

articles.title: ATCC condena el "fortalecimiento de la alianza" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ATCC condena el "fortalecimiento de la alianza" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ATCC) -- Hace poco, en una audiencia del Comite de Servicios Militares de la Camara de Representantes de EE.UU., el comandante de las tropas norteamericanas en el Pacifico hablo de la "necesidad de fortalecer la alianza" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea para "detener la provocacion" de alguien.
					Esto puso al desnudo la ambicion agresiva de EE.UU. de provocar a toda costa la nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana azuzando a los titeres surcoreanos a la confrontacion con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 EE.UU. mantiene el invariable intento estrategico de tomar mas firmemente en lo militar el Sur de Corea y desencadenar la segunda guerra coreana teniendolo como trampolin y a la larga realizar el dominio militar sobre Asia.
					
					  Para este fin, EE.UU. prepara estrictamente conforme a su demanda operacional el ejercito surcoreano para lanzarlo como brigada de choque para la provocacion de nueva guerra.
					
					  Por tanto, el fortalecimiento de la alianza EE.UU.- Sur de Corea persigue el objeto de elevar el "papel" del ejercito titere surcoreano en la provocacion y cumplimiento de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC bajo el rotulo de asegurar la coincidencia de las acciones militares de las tropas norteamericanas y el ejercito surcoreano.
					
					  EE.UU. habla ruidosamente del "fortalecimiento de la alianza" con el Sur de Corea, lo cual no pasa de ser una artimana para encubrir su intento de ocupar indefinidamente el Sur de Corea y la esencia de su politica de agresion  contra Corea e inducir en error la opinion publica del mundo.
					
					  Durante decenas de anos pasados el introdujo en el Sur de Corea enormes fuerzas armadas agresivas y distintos medios belicos bajo el pretexto del "fortalecimiento de la alianza" y convirtio el territorio surcoreano en el arsenal de armas nucleares y la base avanzada de la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC.
					
					  En el ano pasado aclaro en el documento comun de las "conversaciones cumbre" el ofrecimiento del "disuasivo ampliado" incluido el "paraguas nuclear" y emplazo en el Sur de Corea 40 aviones "F-15K", la "bomba smart" y otros equipos de operacion.
					
					  En los ultimos tiempos, los buques Aegis de las fuerzas navales norteamericanas entraron en el Puerto de Tonghae de la provincia de Kangwon del Sur de Corea y libraron de manera acelerada los ejercicios militares en el Mar Oeste de Corea. Y EE.UU. planea emplazar de manera adicional en el futuro cercano los 21 cazas "F-15K", los 125 misiles aire-aire de nuevo tipo de mediana distancia, los 35 misiles aire-tierra, los 280 JDAM.
					
					  Todo esto se realiza como un eslabon de las maniobras en cuestion.
					
					 Tambien, los incesantes ejercicios belicos devienen estrictamente el producto conjunto de la politica de agresion y la teoria belica anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos y los alborotos de abierto enfrentamiento militar basados en el "fortalecimiento de la alianza" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea.
					
					  En fin de cuentas, la "alianza" entre ellos deviene la de agresion y de guerra contra la RPDC y trajo solo el aumento del peligro de la guerra agravando mas la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Resultan gravisimas las maniobras en cuestion porque estas se perpetran cuando fueron elaborados los planes operacionales para hacer frente al "estado del brusco cambio" de alguien y se realiza de manera acelerada la campana de propaganda negra para entenebrecer la imagen de la RPDC.
					
					  Las maniobras del "fortalecimiento de alianza" de que habla ruidosamente EE.UU. no pasa de ser en su esencia un intento para provocar la nueva guerra en la Peninsula Coreana y perjudicar la soberania de la RPDC introduciendo activamente a los maniacos de guerra surcoreanos en las maniobras de enfrentamiento con esta.
					
					  Ellas devienen el archi-crimen que pisotea la aspiracion del pueblo coreano y los demas del mundo y la demanda de la epoca por la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  EE.UU. debe ver correctamente la realidad y abandonar su absurda ilusion de realizar su dominio a la RPDC y Asia tomando de continuo el Sur de Corea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia a la banda de conservadores surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia a la banda de conservadores surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el comandante de las tropas agresoras norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea, Sharp, en su apariencia en la Camara de Representantes, dijo que sus tropas hacen junto con el Sur de Corea los preparativos para hacer frente a todas las "posibilidades del cambio brusco de la situacion en el Norte". Por otra parte, el "consejo consultivo por la democracia, la paz y la reunificacion" del Sur de Corea y otras entidades arman alboroto militar frente al supuesto "cambio". 
					Tales maniobras de EE.UU. y de la banda de conservadores surcoreanos devienen una grave provocacion que revela abiertamente la intencion de agredir a la RPDC y un complot villano para denigrar la autoridad exterior de esta. 
					
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					Lo que no podemos tolerar es que las autoridades surcoreanas intensifican cada dia mas la malsana campana de confrontacion institucional y la provocacion de guerra de agresion contra la RPDC en adhesion a su amo norteamericano. 
					
					La banda de conservadores ya trazo los guiones de agresion al Norte de caracter provocativo como el "plan de dominacion emergente" y la "busqueda y estudio sobre el gran programa de reunificacion", suponiendo el "cambio brusco de la situacion" en la RPDC, y se desespera junto con EE.UU. por agredir a esta. 
					
					Pero, la "contingencia" con que suenan EE.UU. y la banda de conservadores surcoreanos no pasa de ser una ilusion vana. 
					
					La RPDC es la potencia invencible, porque echo raices entre las masas populares y se asegura por las poderosas fuerzas armadas del Songun. 
					
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos deben preocuparse del destino de si mismos, antes de cuestionar el supuesto "cambio brusco de la situacion" de alguien. 
					
					La RPDC aprecia como la vida su dignidad y sistema social y castigara sin piedad a quienes se atreven a atentarlos.

articles.title: Japon no podra eludir liquidacion de su pasado, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japon no podra eludir liquidacion de su pasado, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ATCC) -- Los reaccionarios japoneses siguen negando los crimenes de su pasado y evadiendo su liquidacion, lo cual muestra que ellos anoran el periodo de la dominacion colonial y abrigan el intento maligno de rehabilitarlo.
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 7 y continua:
					
					  Hace poco, un tribunal de Alemania sentencio la cadena perpetua a un ex-criminal de guerra nazi quien habia asesinado a los civiles holandeses durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					  Pero, es muy contrastante al respecto la actitud de Japon, mismo pais criminal de guerra.
					
					  Hasta la fecha a mas de medio siglo desde el cese de la guerra, Japon no reconoce los crimenes de agresion perpetrados en el pasado por los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses piensan en que con el paso de los dias sus crimenes del pasado se desapareceran en la mente de las personas y, a la larga, no se pondran sobre el tapete.
					
					  Por eso, ellos hacen tesoneros esfuerzos por evitar a toda costa la liquidacion del pasado criminal saliendo con sofisterias absurdas de toda indole.
					
					  Por mucho que transcurra el tiempo y cambien las generaciones, no podran debilitarse ni borrarse los crimenes ensangrentados de los imperialistas japoneses.
					
					  Es ley que cuanto mas encubren los crimenes tanto mas se agrandan su gravedad y castigo.
					
					Para Japon sera mejor reflexionar con sinceridad sobre sus crimenes del pasado y hacer lo que debe hacer.
